sources.title: The Plank
sources.description: Title: The Plank Summary: Classic short British comedy, full of stars, about two workmen delivering planks to a building site. This is done with music and a sort of "wordless dialogue" which consists of a few ... Directed by: Eric Sykes Actors: Tommy Cooper, Eric Sykes, Jimmy Edwards Production Company: Associated London Films Release Date: 1967 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 Classic short British comedy, full of stars, about two workmen delivering planks to a building site. This is done with music and a sort of "wordless dialogue" which consists of a few mumbled sounds to convey the appropriate emotion.

metadata.Plot: Classic British comedy, full of stars, about two workmen delivering planks to a building site. This is done with music and a sort of "wordless dialogue" which consists of a few mumbled sounds to convey the appropriate emotion.
